entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Separate public, private and internal structure properties #63082
  • [Android][x86] System.Tests.GCExtendedTests.AllocateArrayTooLarge throws OverflowException instead of OutOfMemoryException #63079
    7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Cross compilation instructions. #63075
  • Enhance BinarySearch to accept a Func<T, int> instead of value and comparer #63074
    Future
  • .Net6: When i enable server gc mode my application start crashing frequently. #63070
  • Logging - inject custom fields into console logger (json) via DI #63068
  • Codegen for `System.Numerics.Complex` seems to be suboptimal #63067
  • Blazor MAUI Android SSL Certification failed for self-signed server #63064
  • Visual Studio 2022 : Extension code C# - JsonContent.CreateContent no longer works #63063
  • Cannot create instance of type 'System.Text.Json.JsonDocument' because it is missing a public parameterless constructor. #63061
  • Options pattern does not work if I initialize the IEnumerable type model #63083
  • Opportunities to improve TE Platform-Plaintext benchmark #63059

Closed

  • System.Text.Json source generator ignores properties from base records defined in separate assemblies #61772
    6.0.x
  • ApplicationSettingsBase fails when same attribute appears at class level and at property level #62593
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support the `decimal` type in Attribute values #63060
  • immutable records can be changed via reflection #63077
  • [API Proposal]: Detecting whether we are in NativeAOT reflection-free mode. #61387
  • string.IsNullOrWhitespace nullable annotation #63066
  • Optimizing generic math #34681
    Future
  • LoggerMessage not serializing type #62957
    7.0.0
  • createdump requires root user #62781
  • Channel<T>.Reader.ReadAllAsync() may make memory leak #63006
  • Move/create authorization classes in .Net Core #25773
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete some dead code #63087
    community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Remove null check during initblk/cpblk with size 0 #63086
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Move `System.Drawing.Common` to `SafeHandle`s et. al. #63085
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix a regression caused by 9ddd58a58d14a7bec5ed6eb777c6703c48a… #63084
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Don't access MonoClassField:parent directly #63081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disable some tests failing on Android x86 #63080
    area-System.Collections
  • [mono] Use Xcode path from xcode-select instead of hardcoding #63076
    area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] add gc directory for LoongArch64. #63071
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono][wasm] Allow methods with finally clauses to be AOTed. #63065

Merged

  • Override same attributes found at class and property level in ApplicationSettingsBase #63025
    area-System.Configuration, 7.0.0
  • disable failing HTTP3 interop test #63055
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #62850
    area-codeflow
  • [tests] Cleanup copy/pasted assembly update test projects #62970
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] fix sample make files & RunScript bash lowercase problem #63062
  • [wasm] Tweak set timeout #62898
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [mono] Make some icalls return objects using an extra ObjectHandleOnS… #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reduce size of HttpHeaderValueCollection #63057
    area-System.Net.Http
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values #62798
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1524343 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Include properties on records for (de)serialization in source-gen #62668
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • HttpConnectionPool improvements #62935
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use System.Runtime.InteropServices.EnableConsumingManagedCodeFromNativeHosting #62903
    linkable-framework, area-Interop-mono
  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringLanguageAttribute #62995
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary assignment of a value to local variables in SPC #63020
    area-System.Runtime
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Divide properties into: public, private, protected. #62627
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Add LoongArch64 support in libunwind. #62979
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interace for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] add all the coreclr-build-config files #62889
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] add coreclr-libraries directory. #62888
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] add the coreclr/pal directory #62887
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix source-link test #62914
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [DRAFT][wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend CPU capabilities detection for osx-arm64 (#62832) #62958
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't create multiple large files at the same time #63032
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, test enhancement, 6.0.x
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, no recent activity, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Add ns2.0 support to System.Formats.Cbor #62872
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tls callbacks #1795

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Problem importing NativeAOT static library (.lib) in C++ project #1794
  • [NativeAOT] ld does not support aarch64linux #1785

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a way to end a hot reload session when using Visual Studio but not using the debugger #23143
  • SDK 6.0.1 (Hidden) Access Denied errors #23138
  • 'dotnet run' command should fail with unknow arguments #23136

Closed

  • GLIBC_PRIVATE not defined error in dotnet SDK version 5.0.404 on RHEL #23137

PullRequests

Updated

  • Respect opt-outs from dotnet/msbuild#7008 #22719

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Championed: Non-defaultable value types #146
  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0072: False positive when using switch expression and pattern matching with "or" to default case #58468
  • Rivisit 'async go to impl'. #58467
  • if you have: `readonly ref int x = ref y` does this count as a read/write ref now? or just a read-ref? It should be the latter. Can you check, fix if necessary, and add test? #58466
  • RenameSymbolAsync does not rename all instances (bug exists as of v3.10) #58463
  • Update the code that computes effective severity for EditorConfig UX similar to #58461 #58462
    17.1

Closed

  • A lone semicolon in a top level statement in VS 16.11 will cause the app to terminate without errors #58465
  • [Source Generator] Syntax highlighting partially broken by SyntaxReceiver #54768
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup - Sort accessibility modifiers fixer doesn't work #42575
    17.1.P2
  • Task List is showing all items twice #53456
    17.1
  • Removed CodeAnalysisRuleSet from csproj file, opening Active Ruleset finds another ruleset file at a higher directory level and opens it #53552
    Backlog
  • Is there a way to skip the analysis for a configured list of documents (code files)? #53671
    17.1
  • VS2019 16.10 crazy syntax error wavy line #53717
    17.1
  • TreatWarningsAsErrors doesn't work on diagnostics configured via category #53742
    17.1
  • IDE0044 "make field readonly" false positive #57983
    17.1
  • Make field readonly "IDE0044" false positive when used with ref locals #46785
    Backlog
  • RegisterCodeFixesAsync does not get called for fixable diagnostic id #57621
    17.1
  • Warnings are not treated as errors even if all settings are set correctly #57539
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • IDE change to handle /warnaserror with Warning analyzer bulk configur… #58461
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Handle /warnaserror with Warning analyzer bulk configuration in edito… #58460
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Stack Trace Explorer improvements #58458
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add GlassTestsHotReloadService external access #58456
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix MakeFieldReadonly false positive for ref assignments #58459
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Clear prior build errors for additional and analyzer config docs at s… #58457
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts. #58433
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • set compilers.sln as the default solution when opening with VS Code #58454
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove BackgroundParser and BackgroundCompiler #58453
    Area-IDE
  • Improve support for TestWorkspace with source generated files #58455
    Area-IDE
  • Improve error reporting for 'this()' initializer from 'record struct' constructor #58430
    Area-Compilers
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider deprecating more things in SpaServices.Extensions #39160
  • Blazor Make Default Template Favicon Blazor Logo #39159
  • FindByIdAsync requires string instead of int even with ApplicationUser: IdentityUser<int> #39157
  • Very high memory consumption in Blazor app #39156
  • a blazor page has many iframe and iframe is also blazor webassembly app #39153
  • Perf regression: json_netty #39151
  • gRPC Benchmarks broken #39149
  • UseSpa UseReactDevelopmentServer logging incorrect #39147

Closed

  • FileUpload: Did not receive any data in the allotted time. #38842
  • CORS AllowAnyOrigin starts not working after .NET 6 upgrade #39152
  • Downloading large files in Blazor WASM - memory leak? #39131
  • Problem with the ASP.NET Core-Web-API template if creating new project with "swagger" #39158
  • HTTP Error 500.19 - Internal Server Error/ Error code 0x8007000d #39123
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Advanced NewtonsoftJson parsing error handling #39132
    Backlog
  • Set asp-append-version to true for everything #39150
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #39142
  • Perf regression: plaintext #39143
  • ControllerBase.Ok(object value) responds with 204 status code when value is null #8847
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Work around dotnet/msbuild#3274 #39146
    area-commandlinetools

Merged

  • Enable template localization on dotnet CLI #38867
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/5.0] Move to OSX.1015.Amd64.Open #39049
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x

Updated

  • Ignore identical types when loading routable components #39129
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Trim "Async" Suffix #39128
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix CertificateManagerEventSource events 16 and 30 #37625
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Remove OPT_NO_FTS/LTS #39141
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Translate HRESULT error codes from the DiagnosticClient into human-readable exceptions #2784
  • gcdump fails to collect dump under high load. #2404
    .NET 7.0
  • Document caveats around ptrace and dumping #2246
    .NET 6.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionViewSource #3837
  • Synchronized Selectors #3836
  • Sometimes Password Entry Throw 'Specified argument was out of the range of valid values' #3834
  • Delete the Visual Property or Make it work #3833
    6.0.200-preview.12
  • [Bug]iOS,Android: Grid not measured size by it's content #3832
  • InvalidateMeasure in child triggers parent measure #3831
  • FlexLayout > Frame > FlexLayout > Any Content throws error. #3826

Closed

  • SearchBarHandler on iOS subscribes to wrong text changed event #3717
  • [Bug] AutomationId not usable for automated UI testing #3260
    6.0.200-preview.12

PullRequests

Merged

  • [iOS] Updated SearchBarHandler native events #3728
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Remap Automationid to contentDesc for Xamarin.UITests and mitigate the accessibility issues around this #3835
  • [controls] Brush.Foo should return immutable instances #3824
    area/perf 🏎️

Updated

  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮
  • Implement GoBack, GoForward and Reload methods in WebViewHandler #3316
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>, do-not-merge
  • [Android] Listview handler via `Compatibility.ViewRenderer` #3817
    do-not-merge
  • [core] remove Try/AddHandlers() APIs for linker-friendliness #3825
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Did the naming convention change for HasCheckConstraint in v.6? Is this a breaking change? #27059
  • LocalView<TEntity>.Contains returns true for detached entity #27056

Closed

  • InputObject `GeometryOverlaySortInput` has no fields declared #27042
  • Problem referencing a shadow property in a compound unique index #27057

PullRequests

Created

  • Christmas crackers: Add Property/Reference/etc overloads that take IProperty/INavigation #27058

Updated
